title: Event Recommendation API
summary: As a developer, I want to access user preferences through the Event Recommendation API so that I can create applications that recommend social events tailored to individual interests, enhancing social inclusion for elderly users.

title: Social Interaction Tracking
summary: As a developer, I want to access user interaction data with family and friends through the API so that I can create applications that encourage regular communication and foster social engagement.

title: Social Media Integration
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate third-party social media APIs into ALFRED so that users can share updates and engage with their community directly from the platform.

title: Feedback Loop for Social Engagement
summary: As a developer, I want to access user engagement metrics related to social activities so that I can improve the applications I create for the elderly and their caregivers.

title: User-Generated Content Sharing
summary: As a developer, I want to enable users to create and share content related to events or social activities so that they can engage with their community and express their creativity.

title: Social Engagement Notifications
summary: As a developer, I want to enable notifications for users about upcoming social events that match their interests so that they can stay engaged and connected with their community.
